title: Develop and Deploy Laravel Applications with Docker
description: Follow along as I show you how to develop, test, and deploy a fully-featured Laravel application with Docker and Docker Compose.
contents: Introduction to Docker and Docker Compose
Installing Docker on your local machine
Building a simple CRUD application for testing
Creating tests for our example application
Installing and running tests with PHPUnit
Improving Docker performance and response time
Deploying an app manually with git
Deploying an application with Docker Hub
Using Let's Encrypt with a production Docker app
Deploying a clustered Laravel app with Kubernetes
CI/CD for a Dockerized app via CircleCI

faqs.question: What payment methods can I use?
faqs.answer: The course is made available through the service Gumroad. During checkout you can choose to use either a debit card, credit card, or Paypal account.

faqs.question: What format are the course videos available in?
faqs.answer: After completing your purchase, you're given the choice between watching the videos directly on Gumroad, or downloading a zip archive containing all 24 videos in MP4 at standard full HD resolution.

faqs.question: Is there a discount for teams?
faqs.answer: There is currently no discount or special licensing for teams. I anticipate course videos being shared with colleagues, although I'd appreciate any additional purchases you make for your team.

faqs.question: What if I don't like this course?
faqs.answer: I've put a lot of time and energy into making this course useful for a wide variety of developers. However, if you feel you haven't legitimately learned anything from it please email me your reasoning and I will provide a full refund.

faqs.question: Can I view a sample video?
faqs.answer: This course follows a very similar teaching and recording style to the Laravel and Docker videos found on my YouTube channel. If you would still like to preview a video from this course, email me at the address below and I will send you one of the included videos.
